attributes.action: Make an absolute offence of Dangerous Driving whilst driving not in accordance with a licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Drivers who cause death or injury to another are automatically charged with, or are automatically guilty of, dangerous driving if, 
1: They do not hold a full drivers licence, UK or EU, and
2: Are driving otherwise than in accordance with the provisional
licence requirements. 

After all if they are not under supervision and have not passed their
test then they might reasonably be assumed to be a danger to others. 

Otherwise we would not need a test!
